name: Aleksandr Liukov
profile: Security engineer with 11 years of experience rooted in IT infrastructure, DevSecOps, and platform security. Specializes in securing containerized environments through Kubernetes security controls, policy enforcement, and Infrastructure-as-Code automation. Strong advocate for secure-by-design workflows and CI/CD pipeline security. Builds security tooling in Python, with recent focus on AI-driven code analysis. CISSP and OSCP certified.
workRights: Based in Cyprus. Open to relocation to London. Require employer-sponsored visa.
